trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Port St Lucie
There was one other sighting in Port St Lucie on or around January 16th 2009
Summary: Saw series of bright red-orange lights flying in north to south direction along Atlantic Coast.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 8 PM I was out running and bright lights caught my attention. For the next 2 hours I watched up to 27 bright red and orange slow moving lights follow the same flight path from North to South. I could not hear ANY sound from the objects. This makes me think that It was not a normal aircraft. The Lights were intense so I could not make out any clear shape of the actual object. I eventually saw up to 5 objects together moving along the same path. This whole process went on for approx. 2 Hours then it stopped. My neighbors witnessed the same event. They tried to take some digital pictures. A few young people stopped and observed the same lights and promptly called 911 to report the UFO. I was very excited to see a UFO finally and to see several was great! I called a few relatives to let them know about the sightings. The next day I tried to call the local television news and they were only interested if I had pictures or Video.
